005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007/**
008 * Flag values for use with value listeners.
009 *
010 * <p>The flags are a bitmask and must be OR'ed together to indicate the combination of events
011 * desired to be received.
012 *
013 * <p>By default, notifications are only generated for remote changes occurring after the listener
014 * is created. The constants kImmediate and kLocal are modifiers that cause notifications to be
015 * generated at other times.
016 */
017public enum ValueListenerFlags {
018  ; // no enum values
019
020  /**
021   * Initial listener addition.
022   *
023   * <p>Set this flag to receive immediate notification of the current value.
024   */
025  public static final int kImmediate = 0x01;
026
027  /**
028   * Changed locally.
029   *
030   * <p>Set this flag to receive notification of both local changes and changes coming from remote
031   * nodes. By default, notifications are only generated for remote changes.
032   */
033  public static final int kLocal = 0x02;
034}
